channel.title: Donator check? [delta] REP ++

item.title: Donator check? [delta] REP ++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[code]if(NPCID == 1413) {
if(!inCombat && donator >=1) {
toX = 3097;
toY = 3950;
NpcDialogue = 407;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
addItem(2621, 1);

    } else {
	
            sM("You must be out of combat to telepor and a donator!");
    }

}[/code]
I made it so when you click this npc it teles you to the donator zone, but only the combat check works. If i have 0 donator the teleport still works, and yes, the donator in the character file is working perfectly. Ive tested this with objects and commands and it works fine, just not with npcs. Any ideas?

Read full topic
